passes.Name: Events Pass
passes.Description: The Events Pass gives the ticket holder access to the 18 literary events planned across the two days of the fest.

passes.Name: Events + Accommodation Pass
passes.Description: The Events + Accommodation Pass allows access to all events, along with overnight accommodation at the BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus.

passes.Name: Events + Pro Show Pass
passes.Description: The Events + Pro Show Pass allows access to all events, along with access to the VM Comedy Night at the BITS Auditorium.

passes.Name: VM '25 Mega Pass
passes.Description: The VM '25 Mega Pass allows the ticket holder to experience everything that VM has to offer - with access to all events, accommodation, and entry into the Comedy Night.
